TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser extends System.Web.Security.MembershipUser

summary.span: 公开和更新 Active Directory 数据存储区中存储的成员资格用户信息。

span.span: Exposes and updates membership user information stored in an Active Directory data store.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 对象用于表示 Active Directory 成员资格数据存储区中的单个成员资格用户。The object is used to represent a single membership user in the Active Directory membership data store. 它将公开有关成员资格用户的信息 (如电子邮件地址), 并为成员资格用户提供功能, 例如更改或重置其密码的功能。It exposes information about the membership user such as the email address, and provides functionality for the membership user such as the ability to change or reset his or her password. 每当应用程序配置为使用 Active Directory 的数据存储时, 应用程序的成员资格提供程序都将返回一个对象。An object is returned by the application's membership provider whenever the application is configured to use an Active Directory data store. 在可配置为使用不同数据存储的应用程序中, 或者在使用多个数据存储的应用程序中, 可以引用基类。In an application that can be configured to use different data stores, or in an application that uses multiple data stores, you can refer to the base class, . 由于对象不实现和属性 , 因此您必须准备好处理在对象上访问这些成员时引发的。 Because the object does not implement the and properties, you must be prepared to handle the that is thrown when these members are accessed on an object. 类实现类使用的内部优化, 以最大程度地减少调用方法时所发生的属性更新的数目。 The class implements internal optimizations used by the class to minimize the number of attribute updates that occur when calling the method. 它还会序列化表示形式 ( 在属性中可用), 以便可以序列化和反序列化对象, 而不会引发异常。It also serializes the representation (available in the property) so that an object can be serialized and deserialized without throwing exceptions. 对象由和方法返回, 或由、和方法返回的组成。 A object is returned by the and methods or as part of a returned by the , , and methods. 如果要更新现有成员资格用户的信息, 方法需要对象。An object is required by the method when you want to update the information for an existing membership user. 属性将映射到 Active Directory 特性。 properties are mapped to Active Directory attributes. 下表列出了属性及其默认属性映射。The following table lists the properties and their default attribute mappings. |PropertyProperty|默认目录属性Default directory attribute|是否可以映射？Can be mapped?| |--------------|---------------------------------|--------------------| ||`securityIdentifier`|NoNo| ||`userPrincipalName`|是, 但必须是 userPrincipalName 或 sAMAccountNameYes, but must be either userPrincipalName or sAMAccountName| ||`comment`|NoNo| ||`whenCreated`|NoNo| ||`mail`|是, 但必须是 Unicode 字符串类型的单值属性。Yes, but must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.| ||n/an/a|不受支持。Not supported by .| ||n/an/a|不受支持。Not supported by .| ||`pwdLastSet`|NoNo| ||无, 但如果对密码重置或检索使用问答安全, 则必须映射到属性。none, but must be mapped to an attribute if using question-and-answer security for password reset or retrieval.|是, 但必须是 Unicode 字符串类型的单值属性。Yes, but must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.| ||`User-Account-Control`广告`User-Account-Control` (AD)

`mDS-UserAccountDisabled`ADAM`mDS-UserAccountDisabled` (ADAM)|NoNo| ||计算自`lockoutTime`和 AD 锁定持续时间 (Windows 2000 上的 ad)computed from `lockoutTime` and the AD lockout duration (AD on Windows 2000)

`msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed`(Windows Server 2003 上的 AD)`msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed` (AD on Windows Server 2003)

`msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed`ADAM`msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed` (ADAM)|NoNo| ||如果由于无效密码尝试次数过多而被锁定, 则返回 "锁定时间" 属性。If locked out due to too many bad password attempts, the lockout time attribute is returned.

如果因错误密码答案尝试次数过多而被锁定, 则`attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime`将返回存储在定义的属性中的值。If locked out due to too many bad password answer attempts, the value stored in the attribute defined by `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime` is returned.

如果由于密码不正确和密码尝试次数过多而被锁定, 则返回最新的日期/时间值。If locked out due to both a bad password and too many bad password attempts, the most recent date/time value is returned.

如果该帐户未锁定, 则返回1/1/1753 以了解 SQL 兼容性。If the account is not locked out, return 1/1/1753 for SQL compatibility.|NoNo| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在网页上使用可以从多个成员资格数据存储返回用户信息的对象的属性。The following code example demonstrates using properties on the object on a Web page that may return user information from multiple membership data stores. 由于由成员资格 提供程序返回的对象所返回的对象未实现和属性,因此代码首先检查从成员身份返回的用户对象的类型 提供程序, 然后再显示这些属性的内容。Because the object that underlies the object returned by the membership provider does not implement the and properties, the code first checks the type of the user object returned from the membership provider before displaying the contents of those properties. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser/CS/admuClassExamplecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser/VB/admuClassExamplevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class with the specified property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建新的对象不会将新的成员资格用户对象添加到成员资格数据存储区。Creating a new object does not add a new membership user object to the membership data store. 若要将新的成员资格用户添加到成员资格数据存储区, 请使用方法。To add a new membership user to the membership data store, use the method. 请注意, 该方法返回添加到数据存储区的成员资格用户的对象。Note that the method returns an object for the membership user added to the data store. 对象通常在应用程序代码中构造以便与方法一起使用, 不过您也可以传递从、 、、或返回的对象。方法。 objects are commonly constructed in application code for use with the method, although you can also pass an object returned from the , , , , or method to the method as well. 对象通常由、 、 、、和方法的成员资格提供程序实现构造。 objects are also commonly constructed by membership provider implementations for the , , , , , and methods.

-or-

summary.span: 获取或设置成员资格用户的应用程序特定信息。

span.span: Gets or sets application-specific information for the membership user.

value.span: 存储在 目录特性中的 Active Directory 成员的特定于应用程序的信息。

span.span: Application-specific information for the Active Directory member stored in the directory attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可用于存储特定于应用程序的成员资格用户的自定义信息。The property can be used to store custom information for a membership user that is specific to an application. 可在的`Comment`属性中存储的信息量由定义。The amount of information that can be stored in the `Comment` property for an is defined by the . 属性将映射到默认的`Comment` Active Directory 属性。 The property is mapped to the `Comment` default Active Directory attribute. 此属性不能重新映射到另一个属性。This property cannot be remapped to another attribute.

summary.span: 获取或设置成员资格用户的电子邮件地址。

span.span: Gets or sets the email address of the membership user.

value.span: 成员资格用户的电子邮件地址。

span.span: The email address of the membership user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性将映射`Mail`到目录属性。 The property is mapped to the `Mail` directory attribute. 可以在 web.config 文件中重新映射此属性, 方法是在配置`attributeMapUserName`文件的[providers 元素 (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9e998377-b07f-44c1-ad9b-20a60e83c18f)元素中设置特性。This property can be remapped in the Web.config file by setting the `attributeMapUserName` attribute in the [providers Element for profile (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9e998377-b07f-44c1-ad9b-20a60e83c18f) element for profiles.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示成员资格用户是否可以进行身份验证。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the membership user can be authenticated.

value.span: 如果可以对用户进行身份验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user can be authenticated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 调用的过程中, 将检查成员资格用户的值。 The value for a membership user is checked during the call to by the . 如果属性返回`false`, 则即使提供的用户名和密码正确, 该方法也会返回`false`。 If the property returns `false`, the method returns `false` even if the supplied user name and password are correct. 属性将映射到以下 Active Directory 属性之一。The property is mapped to one of the following Active Directory attributes. ||| |-|-| |Active DirectoryActive Directory|`User-Account-Control`| |Active Directory 应用程序模式Active Directory Application Mode|`msDS-UserAccountDisabled`| 此属性不能重新映射到另一个属性。This property cannot be remapped to another attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类不支持属性。 The property is not supported by the class. 尝试获取或设置该值将始终引发。Attempting to get or set the value will always throw a . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何确定成员资格用户的基础类型是否为, 并避免引发用于访问属性的。The following code example demonstrates how to determine whether the underlying type of a membership user is , and to avoid throwing a for accessing the property. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码, 请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. summary.span: 从 Active Directory 数据存储区获取成员资格用户的用户标识符。

span.span: Gets the user identifier from the Active Directory data store for the membership user.

value.span: Active Directory 数据存储区中的成员资格用户的用户标识符。

span.span: The user identifier from the Active Directory data store for the membership user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性从常规类型化为`object`的成员资格数据源公开标识符。 The property exposes the identifier from the membership data source generically typed as an `object`. 类可以强制转换为对象。 The class can be cast as a object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例通过将属性转换为对象, 以安全描述符定义语言 (SDDL) 格式显示该属性。The following code example displays the property in Security Descriptor Definition Language (SDDL) format by converting it to a object. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码, 请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser/CS/admuClassExamplecs.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser/VB/admuClassExamplevb.aspx#3)]
